messages.subject: Falling behind
messages.msgSnippet: I have never in my life seen such breast beating and teeth gnashing over two little words - fall behind.  I m sorry I posted to the list.  I was attempting to
messages.messageBody:
I have never in my life seen such breast beating and teeth gnashing over two
little words - fall behind. I'm sorry I posted to the list. I was
attempting to offer comfort to someone who had similar experience to my own.
I'm so sorry I joined the list. I was attempting to find support. I will
unsub because my time is too limited and my health too poor to spend so much
time reading so many emails that are little more than arguing and
pontificating. I sincerely hope that the nastiness over what I quite
innocently posted (I didn't realize you had to read and re-read your posts
for any nuances that might offend and send people into a tizzy) will stop
with my exit.

Sincere best wishes to you all,

Dawn
